mapper.select: SELECT wg.id, wg.title, wg.content, wg.user_id, u.name as author_name, CASE WHEN b.id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as is_bookmarked, wg.created_at FROM web_guide wg LEFT JOIN user u ON wg.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN bookmark b ON wg.id = b.content_id AND b.content_type = 'WEB_GUIDE' AND b.user_id = #{userId} WHERE wg.id = #{guideId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO web_guide ( title, content, thumbnail, user_id, generation_id, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{webGuideRequest.title}, #{webGuideRequest.content}, #{webGuideRequest.thumbnail}, #{userId}, #{generationId}, NOW(), NOW(), false )
mapper.update: UPDATE web_guide SET title = #{webGuideRequest.title}, content = #{webGuideRequest.content}, thumbnail = #{webGuideRequest.thumbnail}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{guideId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = false
mapper.delete: UPDATE web_guide SET is_deleted = true, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{guideId} AND is_deleted = false
